channel.title: Infliction Reborn 732 | Eco | All 25 Skills | Double XP Weekends | Loyalty
channel.description:
Webclient: http://infliction-reborn.com/webclient Download client: http://infliction-reborn.com/downloads/client.jar Website: http://infliction-reborn.com
[CENTER] [img]http://infliction-reborn.com/images/logo.png[/img] [url=http://infliction-reborn.com]http://infliction-reborn.com[/url]
-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=- SERVER IS ONLINE -=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-
Infliction Reborn is an advanced 732 runescape private server that's looking to give players a chance at enjoying what runescape used to be, before the evolution of combat. We have many bosses, working money pouch, working SOF, character clothing and customization, professional staff, and most importantly a stable ddos protected dedicated host to ensure that your playing experience will not be interrupted.[/CENTER]
[CENTER]WITH 100% WORKING DUNGEONEERING!![/CENTER]
List of PVM content - Full Godwars with Nex - Corporeal beast - Queen Black Dragon - King Black Dragon - Full Barrows - Daggonoth Kings - Tormented Demons - Kalphite Queen - Frost Dragons - Metal Dragons - Glacors - And tons more!
List of Minigames - Recipe for disaster - Full fight kiln - Full fight caves - Fight pits - Dominion Tower - Full Clan Wars! - Duel arena - Crucible - Custom Trivia!
Other features - Webclient - Automatic Voting System! - Automatic Donating System! - Stable economy - 100% Uptime - Perfect switching - Active Clean Forums - Highscores - Working lodestones with custom demon teleport! - No lag - Constant Updates - Professional and active Staff - Most unique RSPS - Daily updates! - Old and new Runescape Armor - Perfect pking - Fast and smooth switches - 10x hits - Summoning with working familiars - All dupes fixed - Perfect hit formula for melee, range and magic - 100% Slayer coded from scratch - 138 combat, summoning counts - Crystal chest - Hairdresser - Makeover Mage - Working Squeal of Fortune - Working money pouch - Custom interfaces - & So much more!
WITH HD MODE!
Queen Black Dragon! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/UxKWR.png[/img]
Polypore Dungeon! [i]Working swift gloves[/i] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/4VM3d.png[/img]
Working Dungeoneering with over 8 floors! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/zjxJI.png[/img]
Working Crucible! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/EegVU.png[/img]
Thank you for visiting my thread, I hope you can join us and enjoy our server! We've advertised on one forum and within one hour we've got over 20 players. Infliction Reborn is better with friends, so invite some of your friends to play!
[CENTER] [img]http://infliction-reborn.com/images/logo.png[/img] [url=http://infliction-reborn.com]http://infliction-reborn.com[/url] [/CENTER]

item.description:
@taro1234 wrote:

[quote=“Infliction Reborn, post:1, topic:478145”]Webclient: http://infliction-reborn.com/webclient
Download client: http://infliction-reborn.com/downloads/client.jar
Website: http://infliction-reborn.com

[CENTER]

http://infliction-reborn.com

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=- SERVER IS ONLINE -=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

Infliction Reborn is an advanced 732 runescape private server that’s looking to give players a chance at enjoying what runescape used to be, before the evolution of combat. We have many bosses, working money pouch, working SOF, character clothing and customization, professional staff, and most importantly a stable ddos protected dedicated host to ensure that your playing experience will not be interrupted.[/CENTER]

[CENTER]WITH 100% WORKING DUNGEONEERING!![/CENTER]

List of PVM content

  • Full Godwars with Nex
  • Corporeal beast
  • Queen Black Dragon
  • King Black Dragon
  • Full Barrows
  • Daggonoth Kings
  • Tormented Demons
  • Kalphite Queen
  • Frost Dragons
  • Metal Dragons
  • Glacors
  • And tons more!

List of Minigames

  • Recipe for disaster
  • Full fight kiln
  • Full fight caves
  • Fight pits
  • Dominion Tower
  • Full Clan Wars!
  • Duel arena
  • Crucible
  • Custom Trivia!

Other features

  • Webclient
  • Automatic Voting System!
  • Automatic Donating System!
  • Stable economy
  • 100% Uptime
  • Perfect switching
  • Active Clean Forums
  • Highscores
  • Working lodestones with custom demon teleport!
  • No lag
  • Constant Updates
  • Professional and active Staff
  • Most unique RSPS
  • Daily updates!
  • Old and new Runescape Armor
  • Perfect pking
  • Fast and smooth switches
  • 10x hits
  • Summoning with working familiars
  • All dupes fixed
  • Perfect hit formula for melee, range and magic
  • 100% Slayer coded from scratch
  • 138 combat, summoning counts
  • Crystal chest
  • Hairdresser
  • Makeover Mage
  • Working Squeal of Fortune
  • Working money pouch
  • Custom interfaces
  • & So much more!

WITH HD MODE!

Queen Black Dragon!

Polypore Dungeon! Working swift gloves

Working Dungeoneering with over 8 floors!

Working Crucible!

Thank you for visiting my thread, I hope you can join us and enjoy our server! We’ve advertised on one forum and within one hour we’ve got over 20 players. Infliction Reborn is better with friends, so invite some of your friends to play!

[CENTER]

http://infliction-reborn.com
[/CENTER][/quote]
